title: Chicken Curry
instructions: 2. Add chopped onions, garlic, and ginger. Saute until golden brown.
3. Add diced chicken breast and cook until browned.
4. Add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft.
5. Stir in curry powder, chili flakes, and salt.
6. Pour in coconut milk and simmer for 10 minutes.
7. Serve hot with rice or naan.
